briefdescription.para: Create a new instance of XLColumns.

parameterdescription.para: If worksheet is specified it means that the created instance represents all columns on a worksheet so changing its width will affect all columns.
Default style to use when initializing child entries.

briefdescription.para: Deletes all columns and shifts the columns at the right of them accordingly.
Adjusts the width of all columns based on its contents.
Adjusts the width of all columns based on its contents, starting from the startRow.

parameterdescription.para: The row to start calculating the column width.

briefdescription.para: Adjusts the width of all columns based on its contents, starting from the startRow and ending at endRow.

parameterdescription.para: The row to start calculating the column width.
The row to end calculating the column width.

memberdef.argsstring: (Int32 startRow, Int32 endRow, Double minWidth, Double maxWidth)
memberdef.name: AdjustToContents

briefdescription.para: Hides all columns.
Unhides all columns.
Increments the outline level of all columns by 1.
Sets outline level for all columns.
Decrements the outline level of all columns by 1.
Increments the outline level of all columns by 1.

parameterdescription.para: If set to true the columns will be shown collapsed.

briefdescription.para: Sets outline level for all columns.

parameterdescription.para: If set to true the columns will be shown collapsed.

briefdescription.para: Decrements the outline level of all columns by 1.

parameterdescription.para: If set to true it will remove the columns from all outline levels.

briefdescription.para: Show all columns as collapsed.
Expands all columns (if they're collapsed).
Returns the collection of cells.
Returns the collection of cells that have a value.
Returns the collection of cells that have a value.

parameterdescription.para: if set to true will return all cells with a value or a style different than the default.

briefdescription.para: Adds a vertical page break after this column.
Clears the contents of these columns.

parameterdescription.para: Specify what you want to clear.
